meanings.definition: The quality or state of being strong and muscular.
meanings.sent1: His brawninesses helped him lift the heavy box effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She admired the brawninesses of the weightlifter at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy tried to imitate the brawninesses of the big dog, but it just looked cute.
meanings.sent4: The brawninesses of the oak tree's trunk symbolized resilience and power.
meanings.sent5: The wrestler's brawninesses were so impressive that the audience cheered loudly.

meanings.definition: The physical strength and power of a person or animal.
meanings.sent1: The lion's brawninesses allowed it to take down its prey with ease.
meanings.sent2: He relied on his brawninesses to complete the challenging obstacle course.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's brawninesses were so strong that even the villains were in awe.
meanings.sent4: Her brawninesses in the workplace made her a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The brawninesses of the elephant were evident as it effortlessly moved the fallen tree.
